dialogue.speaker: WOMAN
dialogue.context: Caden starts to weep so hard he chokes. Strings of snot pour from his nose. The woman holds him, gently takes off his wig, and strokes his sparse hair. He looks out over her shoulder at the dark empty city at the far end of the warehouse. His rheumy eyes light up.
dialogue.utterance: You're going to be fine.
dialogue.speaker: CADEN
dialogue.utterance: I know what to do with this play now. I have an idea. I think -- The screen goes black fast.
